title: Quick Chicken Liver Pate
ingredients: ['175g Unsalted butter', '3/4lb Chicken livers', '2 Shallots', '1.5 teaspoons Soft thyme leaves', '2 cloves Garlic chopped finely', '2 tablespoons Brandy', '2 teaspoons Anchovy essence or 5 anchovy fillets', '1/2 tin Heinz chicken soup or', '1 tin Heinz chicken soup reduced by 1/2', '1/2 teaspoon Freshly ground black pepper', '55g Clarified butter, melted']
